mapper.select: select fundingNum, fundingName, fundingMaxPrice, gdsDate from Funding_Projects order by fundingNum desc
mapper.insert: insert into FUNDING_PROJECTS(fundingNum, fundingName, fundingMaxPrice, fundingDescription, fundingPurpose, gdsDate) values (SEQ_NUM.nextval, #{fundingName}, #{fundingMaxPrice}, #{fundingDescription}, #{fundingPurpose}, #{gdsDate})
